name: Jump Barrel
summary:
Jump Barrel is a challenging platform game where players have to hide in barrels and escape from underground prisons. To overcome various obstacles, players need to rotate the barrel and jump from side to side, which requires a lot of skill and experience because it can slip on the move.

Jump Barrel, an easy-to-learn control, is an accessible game, but it requires delicate skills to escape. I highly recommend it to challenging platform game fans.
